title: Whole baked fish with potatoes, lemon and sundried tomatoes
description: This recipe looks  impressive, but is actually very straightforward. Sliced lemons add loads of flavour to the juices.
ingredients: 1 x 280g jar sundried tomatoes in oil
2  whole fish (about 400g/14oz) such as sea bass, sea trout or Dover sole, cleaned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
